Title: Enacts the robot tax act; imposes a tax on certain businesses when people are displaced from their employment due to certain technologies
Summary: Imposes a tax on certain businesses when people are displaced from their employment due to certain technologies based on the sum of any taxes or fees imposed by the state or any political subdivision thereof computed based on a displaced employee's wage.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to enacting the "robot tax act"
